statements: SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE role = 'admin'
SELECT username, permission_level FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level > 3
SELECT user_id, role FROM user_permissions WHERE sensitive_data_access = TRUE
SELECT username, permission_level FROM user_permissions WHERE role = 'manager' ORDER BY permission_level DESC
SELECT * FROM user_permissions ORDER BY role ASC, permission_level DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level > 3 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT username, role FROM user_permissions WHERE role = 'admin' AND sensitive_data_access = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, permission_level, sensitive_data_access FROM user_permissions WHERE role = 'manager' ORDER BY permission_level ASC, user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE role IN ('manager', 'analyst') AND sensitive_data_access = TRUE ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT username, permission_level FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level < 5 AND sensitive_data_access = FALSE ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM permissions;
SELECT role, permission_type FROM permissions WHERE risk_data_category = 'Financial';
SELECT id, role, risk_data_category FROM permissions WHERE id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users ORDER BY role DESC;
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE risk_data_category = 'Financial' AND permission_type = 'Read' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT role, COUNT(*) as total_permissions FROM permissions GROUP BY role HAVING total_permissions > 1;
SELECT username FROM users INNER JOIN permissions ON users.role_id = permissions.id WHERE permissions.permission_type = 'Write';
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE role = 'Admin' ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT role, COUNT(*) as total_users FROM users GROUP BY role ORDER BY total_users DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT username, role FROM users
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE role='admin'
SELECT * FROM roles
SELECT role_name FROM roles
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE role='admin';
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM roles WHERE role_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE data_type='table' AND access_level='full' LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.data_type FROM users u JOIN roles r ON u.role = r.role_name JOIN permissions p ON r.role_id = p.role_id;
SELECT user_id, username, password, role FROM users WHERE user_id = 3 AND role IN ('admin', 'user') ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role='Admin';
SELECT role_name, role_description FROM roles WHERE role_name='Moderator';
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users INNER JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id WHERE user_id='1234';
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users LEFT JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id JOIN permissions p ON r.role_id = p.permission_id;

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id LEFT JOIN permissions p ON r.role_id = p.permission_id WHERE u.user_id = '12345';
SELECT role_name, COUNT(ur.user_id) AS users_count FROM roles r LEFT JOIN user_roles ur ON r.role_id = ur.role_id GROUP BY role_name;
SELECT user_id, role_id, permissions FROM users_permissions;
SELECT * FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM roles WHERE role_name LIKE 'Admin%';
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM role_permissions WHERE permissions @> '{"read": true}';
SELECT * FROM users_permissions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE role_id = '456e89b7-1234-d12a-4266-456174174000' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM roles WHERE role_name = 'Admin' LIMIT 5 OFFSET 2;
SELECT rp.role_id, rp.permissions FROM role_permissions rp JOIN roles r ON rp.role_id = r.role_id WHERE r.role_name = 'Admin';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_roles FROM roles;
